verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bless the Lord, O my soul, and all that is within me Bless His holy name. Forget not all His benefits, for He’s forgiven You,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bless His holy name. Remember all His love for you, for He’s redeemed Your life from death, and crowned you with mercy.{/lang-eng}
